helpText:
Commands:
  send <destId> <message>  — sends the message to the specified UCSAP
  whoami                   — shows my UCSAP id
  peers                    — hint about the config
  help                     — shows this help
  quit                     — exits the application
selfIdInvalid: --self must be a valid short integer
peersHint: (Hint) Check the config file in the classpath. Use multiple instances with the SAME config and distinct ids.
